verbose_text: Several critical observations were made : i) Post-stroke social isolation mediated PSD and PSA may reduce hippocampal neurogenesis and impaired memory function via TGF-beta; ii) nasal administration of hyperforin improved PSD and PSA via TGF-beta in post-stroke SI mice; iii) reduced hippocampal neurogenesis and impaired memory function in post-stroke SI mice was restored following hyperforin treatment via TGF-beta.
evidence: TGF-beta in post-stroke SI mice; iii) reduced hippocampal neurogenesis and impaired memory function in post-stroke SI
